description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Strap on your snow pants and get ready for the best sled ride of your life.  Six high speed hills and satisfying unlockable features make this an adrenaline spiked adventure for gamers of any skill degree. Tour the beautiful mountains of Colorado at breakneck speeds alone or in two player mode while you enjoy hours of gaming fun and don't be afraid to...BAIL!
